name: MarbelousMaze
description:
Marbelous is a small game prototype I've created for my Tafe course. You have 2 minutes to navigate the maze and reach the goal block.

You can speed up by collecting Green Blocks
You can slow down by collecting Red Blocks

There is also a points system. Orange Blocks give points, Green blocks give a smaller number of points.

Music is by Ghostsoul
https://ghostsoul.bandcamp.com/
Level music is Dark Rooms
Winning music is The Rising Sun
